org.sql: SELECT DISTINCT articles.id AS alias_0, articles.id FROM articles LEFT OUTER JOIN reactions ON reactions.reactable_type = "$1" AND reactions.reactable_id = articles.id WHERE articles.id = "$2" ORDER BY articles.id ASC LIMIT "$3"

rewrites.sql: SELECT DISTINCT articles.id AS alias_0, articles.id FROM articles WHERE articles.id = "$2" ORDER BY articles.id ASC LIMIT "$3"
SELECT articles.id AS alias_0, articles.id FROM articles WHERE articles.id = "$2" ORDER BY articles.id ASC LIMIT "$3"
